job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment
job_details.full_text:
Gen AI Engineer

As a GenAI engineer, you will play a crucial role in GenAI projects, contributing significantly to the development of impactful and responsible user-centered products and services. Drawing upon your expertise in both quantitative and qualitative research, you will strategically identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. We seek an individual comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas, and rigorously testing GenAI solutions.
   * Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems.
   * Use visualization tools/modules to be able to explore and analyze outcomes & for Model validation eg: using Power BI / Tableau
   * Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes designing and implementing GenAI use cases, identifying optimal methods for GenAI data architecture, and applying AI/ML techniques to solve business problems. It also mentions building CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment and using visualization tools for exploration and validation. These align strongly with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly the focus on generative models and their application in user-centered products.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems' directly relates to the creation and application of AI/ML models.
job_tasks.phrase: identify optimal methods to inspire, guide, and formulate the GenAI data architecture-from having a strong knowledge of Gen AI alogorithms to using wide variety of AI/ML techniques to solve business problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems' implies the development and integration of GenAI solutions into practical applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement Gen AI use cases for major institutions for their business problems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment' is a direct indicator of MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Build CI/CD pipelines for ML model deployment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solve business problems' indicates a need to understand and address business challenges with AI solutions.
The phrase 'rigorously testing GenAI solutions' implies model evaluation and validation, which falls under modeling.

soft_skills.phrase: comfortable with uncertainty, possessing excellent communication skills, and showcasing a blend of rigor and creativity when tackling open-ended questions, shaping early ideas
